item.title: Randomness
item.description: Chapter 1: Introduction to Randomness Randomness is everywhere in nature and plays a vital role in creating unpredictable and lifelike behaviors. From the chaotic flutter of a butterflyâ€™s wings to the random distribution of stars in the sky, randomness gives the world its dynamic nature.
